description:
Toudou Heikurou is a member of the United Nations leadership, he is the Far East District Chief Administrator. General manager of the Yamato Plan Division. He is from Kochi Prefecture.
Administrator of the Far East District. Also the chief executive of the UN Headquarters Space Planning Office and the Yamato Plan. Although he is not a military man, he has been Admiral Okita`s friend and confidant for many years.
name: Toudou Heikurou
